biotools.summary: PRIORITY is a tool for de novo motif discovery in the context of transcription factor (TF) binding sites. It implements a new approach to motif discovery in which informative priors over sequence positions are used to guide the search.

bioschemas.name: PRIORITY
bioschemas.summary: PRIORITY is a tool for de novo motif discovery in the context of transcription factor (TF) binding sites. It implements a new approach to motif discovery in which informative priors over sequence positions are used to guide the search.
